Prerequisite Trained in Intimidation

Trigger You are attacked by a creature that you haven't yet acted hostile toward. You must use this reaction before the creature rolls its attack.

A mean look from you can make the mightiest attack shake with regret. Attempt an @Check[type:intimidation]{intimidation check} against your attacker's Will DC. The creature is then temporarily immune to your Vengeful Glare for 24 hours.

Critical Success Same as success, but the creature pulls its attack, wasting its action, and can't use hostile actions against you until the beginning of its next turn.

Success You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to at attack rolls and damage rolls to the next attack you make against the triggering creature before the end of your next turn. This circumstance bonus increases to +2 if you are legendary in intimidation.

Failure The creature's attack is unaffected.
